trackerInfo.tooltip: See infowmation about the connyected twackews. An option with yewwow text wequiwes a westawt of the connyection ow pwogwam to appwy.

trackerSettings.title: {trackerName} settings
trackerSettings.text: Owewwide the gwobaw twackew settings fow this twackew. Can be usefuw if onwy cewtain twackews hawe bad mag statuses.

fps.title: FPS twansfew wate
fps.tooltip: Sewect the FPS twansfew wate fow the twackews. If using Bwuetooth, 50FPS may be mowe stabwe.

sensorMode.title: Sensow mode
sensorMode.tooltip: Sewect the sensow mode fow the twackews. Mode 1 enyabwes the magnyetometew which is best if you hawe a stabwe geomagnyetic enwiwonment (mag status is gween ow yewwow). If unstabwe (mag status is wed), use mode 2.

sensorCorrection.title: Sensow auto cowwection
sensorCorrection.tooltip: Enyabwe ow disabwe sensow auto cowwection (dynyamic cawibwation) featuwes. Usuawwy nyot nyeeded to be changed and wesuwts wawy between enwiwonments.

trackerModel.title: Twackew modew
trackerModel.tooltip: Sewect the modew of HawitowaX twackews you hawe, the HawitowaX Wiwewess ow HawitowaX Wiwed (1.1b/1.1/1.0).

connectionMode.title: Connyection mode
connectionMode.tooltip: Sewect the connyection mode used to connyect to the twackews. Muwtipwe modes can be used at the same time if wanted.

comPorts.title: COM powts
comPorts.tooltip: Sewect the COM powts youw GX(6/2) dongwes ow HawitowaX 1.1b/1.1/1.0 twackews awe using. Up to 4 powts can be sewected (3 fow GX6 and 1 fow GX2) unwess checks awe bypassed.

other.title: Othew settings
other.tooltip: Some settings fow the pwogwam that don't fit in the othew categowies.

updates.title: Update checking
updates.tooltip: Modify the settings used when checking fow updates on pwogwam stawtup.

trackerSettings.title: Twackew settings
trackerSettings.tooltip: Set the gwobaw settings fow the twackews (can be uvwwiden pew-twackew).

fps.title: FPS twansfew wate
fps.tooltip: Sewect the FPS twansfew wate fow the twackews. If using Bwuetooth, 50FPS may be mowe stabwe.

sensorMode.title: Sensow mode
sensorMode.tooltip: Sewect the sensow mode fow the twackews. Mode 1 enyabwes the magnyetometew which is best if you hawe a stabwe geomagnyetic enwiwonment (mag status is gween ow yewwow). If unstabwe (mag status is wed), use mode 2.

sensorCorrection.title: Sensow auto cowwection
sensorCorrection.tooltip: Enyabwe ow disabwe sensow auto cowwection featuwes (dynyamic cawibwation). Usuawwy nyot nyeeded to be changed and wesuwts wawy between enwiwonments.

about.title: About
about.text: The SwimeTowa pwojyect is a middwewawe pwogwam that awwows you to connyect the HawitowaX twackews to the SwimeVW sewwew.

debugging.title: Debugging
debugging.tooltip: An option with yewwow text wequiwes a westawt of the connyection ow pwogwam to appwy.
debugging.text: Enyabwe ow disabwe debugging featuwes fow the pwogwam. Using wogging mode 'Aww data (!!!)' wiww cause huge wog fiwes and wag, onwy use if asked ow hawe twackew issues!

onboarding.title: Wewcome to SwimeTowa!
onboarding.text:
SwimeTowa is a middwewawe pwogwam that awwows you to connyect youw HawitowaX twackews to the SwimeVW sewwew, bypassing HawitowaConfiguwatow!

To get stawted, sewect how you wouwd wike to set up the pwogwam. Aftew you set up the pwogwam, you wiww be guided on how to set up SwimeVW sewwew.

step-2.title: Automatic setup
step-2.text:
Automatic setup awwows you to wet the pwogwam twy to automaticawwy detect youw settings and set itsewf up fow you. It is the easiest way to get stawted and suppowts aww twackew modews and connyection modes.

It is wecommended (but nyot nyecessawy) to hawe at weast onye of youw twackews tuwnyed on befowe continyuing. When you awe weady, cwick the "Nyext" button.

step-3.title: Auto-detection
step-3.text:
Pwess the button bewow to stawt the auto-detection pwocess. The pwocess may take up to 20 seconds to compwete, make suwe HawitowaConfiguwatow is cwosed.
Aftew the pwocess is compwete, you wiww weceiwe a pop-up with the wesuwts - make suwe they awe accuwate. If the pwocess faiws, you can twy again ow set up SwimeTowa manyuawwy.
step-3.text2: If you awe happy with the wesuwts, cwick the "Nyext" button to continyue. Othewwise, you may set up SwimeTowa manyuawwy.

step-4.title: SwimeVW setup
step-4.text: Nyow we'we suwe you knyow what SwimeVW is, wight? It's the weason why you downwoaded SwimeTowa in the fiwst pwace - it's a softwawe that awwows fow communyication between muwtipwe sensows/twackews to use in SteamVW, wike HawitowaConfiguwatow.
step-4.text2: To use SwimeTowa, you nyeed to hawe SwimeVW sewwew instawwed on youw computew. If you don't hawe it instawwed yet, cwick the button abuv to downwoad and instaww it. Aftew, pwess the "Nyext" button to weawn how to set it up fow SwimeTowa.

step-5.title: SwimeVW connyection
step-5.text: At this point, you wiww nyow want to connyect youw VW headset to youw PC - it's time to put on youw twackews! Make suwe youw twackews (and VW headset) awe connyected and pwess the "Stawt connyection" button to connyect them to the SwimeVW Sewwew.
step-5.text2: When you see aww youw twackews connyected abuv, check SwimeVW Sewwew and accept aww "A nyew twackew was found" pop-ups. Cwick the "Nyext" button to continyue to the nyext step.

step-6.title: Twackew assignment
step-6.text: With youw twackews connyected, you can go thwough the inyitiaw setup of SwimeVW Sewwew. Cwick "Wet's get set up!", then "Skip Wi-Fi settings", and then "I put stickews and stwaps!". Nyext, assign youw twackews to the cowwect body pawt - an exampwe is shown in the scweenshot bewow.

step-7.title: Mounting cawibwation
step-7.text: Aftew assignying the twackews, you wiww be bwought to the mounting cawibwation scween. Sewect "Automatic Mounting" (highwy wecommended) and fowwow the on-scween instwuctions on how to do a mounting cawibwation. If it does nyot wook wight aftew the cawibwation, you can awways wedo it untiw it's accuwate ow mess with "Manyuaw Mounting".

step-8.title: Wesets & cawibwation
step-8.text: You wiww nyow see a smaww tutowiaw on how to pewfowm "wesets" in SwimeVW. With SwimeTowa (awong with SwimeVW's buiwt-in tap-to-weset), you may pwess any of the buttons a nyumbew of times (within 0.5s) on youw twackews. See the wist fow the weset options:

step-9.title: When to weset
step-9.text: Hewe awe the expwanyations of the thwee diffewent wesets and when they wouwd be used:
step-9.text2: A yaw weset is the onye you wiww use the most, it ewiminyates most (if nyot aww) dwift on onye axis. This is wess accuwate but the fastest and most conwenyient. You onwy nyeed to stwaighten youw wimbs - this can ewen be used whiwe waying ow sitting down!
step-9.text3: A fuww weset is the most accuwate and compwetewy wesets the skeweton in SwimeVW. You must be standing up and stwaight whiwe doing this weset.
step-9.text4: A mounting weset is used when the position of youw twackews hawe physicawwy muvd (ow mounting cawibwation is off). You must be in a "ski pose" whiwe doing this weset.

step-10.title: Body pwopowtions
step-10.text: Nyow it's time to cawcuwate youw body pwopowtions. SwimeVW appwies youw body pwopowtions to a wiwtuaw skeweton to hawe much mowe accuwate twacking if set up cowwectwy. Sewect "Automatic pwopowtions" and fowwow the on-scween instwuctions to pewfowm the cawibwation by fowwowing a set of muvments.

pairing.title: GX(6/2) Twackew Paiwing
pairing.text: Manyage the paiwing of youw twackews connyected with the GX(6/2) communyication dongwes.

connectionFailed.title: Connyection faiwed
connectionFailed.message: Faiwed to stawt a connyection wia the sewected connyection mode(s). Pwease make suwe HawitowaConfiguwatow is cwosed and (if appwicabwe), Bwuetooth is on and/ow the cowwect COM powts awe sewected.

comPortsMissing.title: COM powts missing
comPortsMissing.message: Some COM powts set in the config wewe nyot found, pwease make suwe youw dongwe(s) and twackews awe connyected.

noLogsFolder.title: Nyo wogs!
noLogsFolder.message: You shouwd pwobabwy enyabwe debug wogging fiwst in debugging settings.

noConnectionMode.title: Nyo connyection mode enyabwed
noConnectionMode.message: Pwease enyabwe at weast onye connyection mode in the pwogwam's settings.

noTrackerModel.title: Nyo twackew modew sewected
noTrackerModel.message: Pwease sewect a dewice modew in the pwogwam's settings.

noComPorts.title: Nyo COM powts sewected
noComPorts.message: Pwease sewect at weast onye COM powt in the pwogwam's settings.

trackerWriteError.title: Twackew wwite ewwow
trackerWriteError.message: Faiwed to wwite data to the twackew, pwease check wog fiwes fow mowe infowmation.

trackerReadError.title: Twackew wead ewwow
trackerReadError.message: Faiwed to wead data fwom the twackew, pwease check wog fiwes fow mowe infowmation.

unexpectedError.title: Unyexpected ewwow
unexpectedError.message: An unyexpected ewwow occuwwed, pwease check wog fiwes fow mowe infowmation.

complete.title: Onboawding compwete!
complete.message:
SwimeTowa has been successfuwwy set up! You can awways weopen the onboawding scween in the pwogwam settings. Aftew this diawog, the pwogwam wiww open the wiki page fow you to wead mowe infowmation.

Enjyoy!

pre-check.title: Auto-detect pwe-check
pre-check.message:
This featuwe wiww attempt to automaticawwy detect youw twackews, connyection mode, and twackew settings to appwy the settings in the pwogwam fow you.

Make suwe HawitowaConfiguwatow is cwosed befowe pwoceeding. It is awso wecommended to tuwn on at weast onye of youw twackews to find its settings.

success.title: Auto-detect compweted!
success.message: Auto-detect compweted successfuwwy. Wemembew this may nyot be accuwate, so pwease wewiew the settings that hawe been appwied bewow: {settings}

failed.title: Auto-detect faiwed!
failed.message: Auto-detect faiwed. Pwease make suwe you hawe youw Bwuetooth/GX(6/2) dongwes pwugged in & tuwnyed on.

maxLoggingWarning.title: Wogging mode wawnying
maxLoggingWarning.message: You hawe sewected a wogging mode that may cause huge wog fiwes and wag. Wemembew to onwy use this mode if asked ow hawe twackew issues!

slimevrNotFound.title: SwimeVW nyot found
slimevrNotFound.message: SwimeVW sewwew does nyot seem to be wunnying, make suwe it is wunnying and westawt the connyection. If it is awweady wunnying & youw twackews awe connyected, this is safe to ignyowe.
